name: Qwilfish
flavorText:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

previous.name: Granbull
previous.flavorText:
It is actually
timid and easily
spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails
about to fend off
its attacker.

next.name: Scizor
next.flavorText:
It has a steel-hard body. It
intimidates foes by upraising its
eye-patterned pincers.

pokemon.name: Qwilfish
pokemon.flavorText:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

pokemon.name: Overqwil
pokemon.flavorText:
Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the
nickname ”sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.
